name: CGColorConversionInfo
desc: An object that describes how to convert between color spaces for use by other system services.

items.name: init?(src: CGColorSpace, dst: CGColorSpace)
items.desc: Creates a conversion between two specified color spaces.

items.name: enum CGColorConversionInfoTransformType
items.desc: Constants describing how a color conversion uses color spaces.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the Core Foundation type identifier for a color conversion info data type.

items.name: init?(optionsSrc: CGColorSpace, dst: CGColorSpace, options: CFDictionary?)
